founders.name: Ariel Garten
founders.founder_market_fit_statement: Combined deep neuroscience background with wearable design experience to make brain sensing accessible.

problem_definition.problem_statement: Meditation is difficult because people don't know if they are doing it right. They try for 5 minutes, feel unsure, and quit.
problem_definition.gap_analysis: Audio apps provide instruction but no feedback. You can listen to Headspace while stressing out and never know.

impact_metrics.description: 90% of meditation app users churn within 30 days due to lack of progress tracking.

customer_quotes: I tried meditating but I just sat there thinking about my laundry.

product_and_solution.core_stickiness: Gamified biofeedback (birds chirp when you are calm).
product_and_solution.differentiation: The only consumer device with clinical-grade EEG sensors that provides real-time audio feedback.
product_and_solution.defensibility_moat: 7 Patents on signal noise reduction + proprietary brain-state database of 1M sessions.

market_and_scope.beachhead_market: Biohackers and Yoga Studios in North America.
market_and_scope.long_term_vision: Standard of care for anxiety treatment covered by insurance.
market_and_scope.expansion_strategy: Hardware first -> Subscription Software -> B2B Corporate Wellness.

vision_and_strategy.five_year_vision: To do for the brain what the treadmill did for the heart.
